channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Sen. Mike Lee Will Introduce Bill To Halt Federal Judges’ Control Over U.S. Attorneys
item.description: 'President Trump deserves to pick the people working for him,' Lee said.

item.title: No Hope for a NASA Revival
item.description: It’s not just red tape holding back government-funded exploration and innovation. It’s a new cultural pessimism about the future.

item.title: Biden adviser tells House committee there was 'no conspiracy' to hide president's mental state

item.title: Brown agrees to pay $50 million, wins back federal contracts in deal with Trump administration

item.title: Trump announces trade deal with South Korea
item.description: South Korea has struck a last-minute trade deal with the U.S. on Wednesday as steep tariffs loomed ahead of a Friday deadline, President Trump announc...

item.title: The Hidden Costs of Trump’s Tariffs
item.description: Imposing tariffs diverts resources to lobbying efforts that could have been used for productive purposes.

item.title: The Woke Scolds Who Look At Sydney Sweeney And See Hitler Don’t Control Culture Anymore
item.description: The arc of history is long, but it's bending away from mentally ill, terminally online fun-crushers.

item.title: The Smithsonian Should Sue but Won’t, the Bayeux Tapestry Shouldn’t Travel but Will
item.description: Also, the Ford Foundation should return to Detroit but won’t — all defying your art critic’s good sense.

item.title: We’re Suing to Stop Unions from Stealing from Home Caregivers

item.title: We Need To Get Women Out Of Men’s Spaces
item.description: It’s not natural or normal for women to be police officers, or soldiers, or firefighters. And we don’t have to pretend otherwise.

item.title: Classified Documents Were Safer At Mar-A-Lago Than With The FBI
item.description: It seems that in the hands of the FBI, no document was safe from the whim of agents eschewing public transparency.

item.title: Dems Sweep Census Problems Under The Rug In Meltdown Over Republican-Led Redistricting

item.title: Pardon My French
item.description: But I think France should continue to exist.
